articles.title: Fans frustrated over ‘very shoddy’ Cricket World Cup ticketing process
articles.description: Amid the hype for the upcoming World Cup in India, fans complain of exorbitant prices and a chaotic ticket system.
articles.content: Mumbai, India Attending a World Cup is on the wish list of every cricket fan. The opportunity comes once every four years, the wait is long and arduous, it might be expensive but in the end, its wort… [+7003 chars]
